description: This is essential information that is needed for this AFW package by afwdev and related development tools.

afwPackageId.description: This is the AFW package id.
afwPackageId.label: AFW Package Id

afwPackageLabel.description: This is usually the AFW package id with dashes changed to underscores for use in places where dashes are not allowed.
afwPackageLabel.label: AFW Package Label

brief.description: This is a brief description of this repository.
brief.label: Brief

bugReportEmail.description: This is the email to which users should send bug reports. It's used in the bug-report parameter of AC_INIT in configure.ac.
bugReportEmail.label: Bug Report Email

compileOptions.description: This is a list of compile options to add during all compiles for a specific compiler id. The value of this property is an object with property names matching the <LANG> as defined under 'CMAKE_LANG_COMPILER_ID' in the CMake documentation and whose value is a list of compiler options for that <LANG>. This is useful for providing compiler specify options such as warning and error flags.
compileOptions.label: Compile Options

homePageUrl.description: This is the home page for the package/repository. It's used in the url parameter of AC_INIT in configure.ac.
homePageUrl.label: Home Page

installPackageSubdir.description: This is the name of the package as known to make. It's used in the package parameter of AC_INIT in configure.ac. This name is used as the subdirectory within the target's include and lib directories. For the repositories in afw-org, this is usually afw<MAJOR> where <MAJOR> is the same as in the version keyword.
installPackageSubdir.label: Make Package Name

srcdirManifest.description: This is the name of the property in the 'srcdirs' property of the AFW extension, that when loaded at runtime, will register the repository's manifest.
srcdirManifest.label: Manifest Srcsubdir

srcdirs.description: This is information about subdirectories in this repository's src/ directory.
srcdirs.label: Package Srcdir Info

tarballName.description:
This is the name of the tarball produced by make dist. It's used in the tarname parameter of AC_INIT in configure.ac.

This is the full package name. It defaults to package-name with ‘GNU ’ stripped, lower-cased, and all characters other than alphanumerics and underscores are changed to ‘-’.
tarballName.label: Tarball Name

version.description: This is the current version of the package. The form must be <MAJOR>.<MINOR>.<PATCH> as defined at http://semver.org.
version.label: <MAJOR>.<MINOR>.<PATCH>
